p: The search criteria were based on the following requirements: (a) articles and reports with a considerable correlation between the climatic variable and human diseases. The source of those diseases can be a pathogen or a vector/host whose survival or activities can be significantly influenced by climatic factors. (b) Climate change and required human response. The human response can involve relevant policies, education, adaptation measures and social response. No region-wise restriction and data from across the globe was considered. All searches were conducted from July 2018 onwards till 30 November 2018.
